summary:
currently includes stab animations for the following slots:
1hm_attackright
1hm_attackleft
1hm_walkfwdattackright
1hm_walkfwdattackleft
1hm_runfwdattackright
1hm_runfwdattackleft
descriptionHtml:
Replaces some of the onehanded swing animations with stab animations. These animations are created for Zartar's character behaviors mod currently under [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1508450-wip-character-behaviors-enhanced/]development[/url]. 

There are some known issues with these animations, as can be seen in this [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q2tXZrtNVqE]video[/url]

I've tried every possible solution I could think of to smoothen the transition between run walk and standing attacks to no avail.

I'll be contacting experienced animator [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3100441/?]L0rd0fWar[/url] to see if he knows how to deal with this glitch, or better yet, if he is interested in taking over this project.
author: h1zchan
